content.html: Just encountered my first Python 3.10 gotcha! In YAML configuration for GitHub actions, you might have your Python matrix like this: 3.7, 3.8, 3.9 Guess what? 3.10 resolves to 3.1 you need to use 3.7, 3.8, 3.9, "3.10" oh, YAML
content.value:
Just encountered my first Python 3.10 gotcha!

In YAML configuration for GitHub actions, you might have your Python matrix like this:

3.7, 3.8, 3.9

Guess what? 3.10 resolves to 3.1 

you need to use 3.7, 3.8, 3.9, "3.10"

oh, YAML
